title: Titration curve - highest conc. at point R

content.description:
Refer to the following.

A 50.0 mL sample of an acid, HA, of unknown molarity is titrated, and the pH of the resulting solution is measured with a meter and graphed as a function of the volume of 0.100 M NaOH added.
content.question: At point R in the titration, which of the following species has the highest concentration?

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
